title: Domestic Violence Protection
problem_summary: Protection against physical, emotional, or economic abuse within domestic relationships.
law_basics: Protection of Women from Domestic Violence Act, 2005

step_by_step_procedure.description: Ensure immediate safety and seek help if needed.
Contact police, protection officer, or women helpline.
File a complaint or application before Magistrate.

tips_and_warnings: Seek help immediately if in danger
